abstract: This article examines the development of the Quistclose trust in Singapore by reference to the wider discourse on the subject. Besides addressing some of the common issues relating to the finding of a Quistclose trust, this article also examines two of the judicially recognized Quistclose analyses (the dual trust analysis and the Twinsectra analysis) and suggests factors that should be taken into account in deciding which to adopt in a particular case.
title: The Quistclose Trust in Singapore
subject: law
